title: Why isn't Turkey at the All Stars event?
body: Turkey won the IWCA, how come CiS team is there and not the turkish?

replies.body: CIS won IWCA overall. Turkey just won the 5v5. Since CIS won the 1v1s and got far in the 5v5s, the earned more points overall than Turkey, and thus won IWCA.

> [{quoted}](name=Smart Kitty,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=whlETuPj,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-13T00:57:19.266+0000)
>
> CIS won IWCA overall. Turkey just won the 5v5. Since CIS won the 1v1s and got far in the 5v5s, the earned more points overall than Turkey, and thus won IWCA.

This is the correct answer.
Okay, for a second there I thought you were going to make a bad pun.
Legit question..these forums are freaking ghost town
